name: build! Gründungszentrum Carinthia
description: build! Startup Center is the startup incubator for innovative, technology-based business ideas in Carinthia. We support visionary founders from the initial idea to successful market entry with tailored consulting, funding opportunities, and access to a strong network of experts, investors, and established companies. Our offering includes a structured incubation program, access to co-working spaces, and personalized mentoring. As a member of the Carinthian Startup Network, we promote sustainable growth and innovation throughout the region.

name: Lophas
description: *Community based training program and team traing program focusing priorities on protection is better than cure. Digital health, healthcare and laboratory research programs. *Environmental health Protection. *Innovations and AI.

name: Lophas
description: Digital healthcare, innovations and environmental health.

name: Carinthian Venture Fonds GmbH
description: Carinthian Venture Fonds GmbH is a public venture fund founded in 2022 by public stakeholders in Carinthia. The company's objective is to invest in start-ups and small and medium-sized companies in the technology sector in Carinthia (seed and growth stage companies). The company invests only together with a private, independent co-investor.
investmentAreas: Deep Tech, Digital Health, Edu Tech, FinTech & InsurTech, Impact, Other

name: Pentech VC
description: Pentech Ventures is a leading early-stage software investor looking for opportunities to help build breakout companies in emerging market spaces, with particular focus on AI and ML. Founded in 2001, the firm has raised over £150m across three funds and has a long track record of guiding small founding teams from pre-launch to international scale. Pentech’s four partners are ex-operators with deep tech backgrounds and an immersive understanding of the businesses they invest in. Pentech Ventures invest in teams who believe they can build a category leading software company. Our main areas of interest are around use of advanced Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning; and advanced Infrastructure such as Blockchain; and verticals that are enabled via the efficient use of AI and new infrastructure approaches, such as FinServ, Health, Mobility and Enterprise Transformation. We consider both B2C and B2B opportunities.
investmentAreas: AI, ML, Bloackchain, Health, Mobility, Enterprise Transformation

name: PUSH Ventures
description: At PUSH, we are committed to combat climate change and transform healthcare. Our initial investments are typically at pre-seed or seed stage with the potential to follow-on. Focus areas are health and future of the planet in Europe, especially Austria and Germany.
investmentAreas: Healthtech, Fintech, Deep Tech, Crypto, Circularity, Food Systems, TravelTech, HRTech, Energy

name: Forbion Capital Partners
description: Forbion is a leading European venture capital firm that helps companies bridge research and development through the team’s expertise in drug development and company building. Forbion is signatory to the United Nations Principles for Responsible Investment further demonstrating our philosophy that investments in companies should positively impact the health and well-being of patients.
investmentAreas: Life Sciences, Bioeconomy

name: Grow F
description: Grow F, the 5-week hybrid program to unlock your investment potential. Join our hands-on hybrid program, featuring workshops by industry experts, a comprehensive fundraising toolbox, individual support, and access to our wide network, which will prepare you for your upcoming VC round. To kick off your fundraising, we’ll connect you with carefully selected investors at an exclusive in-person networking event in Europe’s biggest startup hubs. Accelerate your path to funding with Grow F!
investmentAreas: Early stage gender-diverse startups in Europe

name: Gateway Ventures
description: Our mission is to make startup investments accessible to everyone. As boutique VC we invest in various Co-Investment opportunities across Europe, leveraging our vast network of over 3000 Business Angels to propel your venture to the next level. We love what we do and we do it with passion. We value bold ideas and smart initiatives.
investmentAreas: B2B SaaS, HealthTech, Sustainability

name: GC Investments
description: GC Investment SA (gcinvest.pl) provides diverse investment opportunities and asset management services for clients looking to enhance their financial portfolios. GC Investments was founded in 1993. The company's investment activities consist of purchasing attractively priced properties in attractive locations, which are then transformed into investment projects, leading to the increase in the property's value.
investmentAreas: Semiconductor, MedTech, Pharma, Healthtech

name: Epopée Gestion
description: Épopée Gestion is an investment firm co-founded in 2020 by Ronan Le Moal and Charles Cabillic. Our mission is to develop the regional economy by providing long-term support to regional companies, mainly based in the West of France. We aim to "reinvest in the regions" and create regional champions through an inclusive investment ecosystem built around four complementary investment sectors: innovation and digital (West Web Valley I and Épopée West Web Valley II), SME/ETI transitions (Épopée Transitions I), sustainable real estate (Épopée Immo Rendement I), and infrastructure contributing to decarbonization. Our geographical area of ​​action is expected to gradually expand in the coming years.
investmentAreas: Funding Platform, Impact Investing, Venture Capital
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Partech
description: Partech is a global tech investment firm headquartered in Paris, with offices in Berlin, Dakar, Dubai, Nairobi, and San Francisco. We are a team of independent thinkers, unconstrained by hype, trend, or fixed ways of working. We believe in the power of alliance in action, working together and side-by-side with the founders we back, in the shared pursuit of success. At Partech, we bring together capital, operational experience, and strategic support for the entrepreneurs we back from seed through to growth stage. Born in San Francisco 40 years ago, today we manage €2.5bn AUM and our current portfolio includes 220 companies in 40 countries across 4 continents.
investmentAreas: Finance, Financial Services, Venture Capital
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Founders Future
description: Founded by serial European tech entrepreneur Marc Ménasé, Founders Future operates as a venture studio, providing creativity, network, support, and productive capital. We've developed an investment platform specifically for entrepreneurs, managed by entrepreneurs, to deliver high value and foster an ambitious mindset. Our goal is to partner with exceptional individuals, align stakeholder interests, and cultivate operational collaborations. At Founders Future, we aim to be a strategic partner, actively influencing business aspects such as product development, go-to-market strategies, business development, and talent acquisition. We've assembled a team of top-tier operating partners from leading entrepreneurial ventures to oversee critical company functions. By sourcing off-market deals and maintaining flexibility in our investment criteria, we prioritize being entrepreneur-friendly and leveraging synergies with our Tier One European investors. Our investment focus centers on teams with A+ potential, scalable business models (including platforms, marketplaces, and SaaS solutions), and industries undergoing significant transformation.
investmentAreas: Finance, Financial Services, marketplaces, SaaS

name: Genesis Ventures
description: Genesis Ventures is an angel co-investment fund providing pre-seed and seed capital to early-stage founders in Greece and Southeast Europe. Backed by the European Investment Fund and leading angel investors, they aim to create successful technology startups, making Greece a unicorn producer and regional tech hub. With tickets ranging from €100,000 to €400,000, Genesis Ventures focuses on strong, committed founding teams across various sectors, offering acceleration programs, coaching, and connections to help startups thrive.
investmentAreas: software, AI, Fintech, Healthcare

name: Ioconic
description: Ioconic, we are a venture studio dedicated to creating and collaborating with ambitious entrepreneurs to establish, fund, and grow companies that aim to pioneer the next generation of consumer experiences. Our team, comprising experienced product, engineering, and go-to-market experts, offers extensive operational support to each venture we engage with. Our partnerships include some of the largest and most respected investors and leading technology platforms globally, providing a robust foundation for the success and growth of our emerging next-generation digital businesses. At ioconic, we are committed to driving innovation and shaping the future of consumer experiences through strategic collaboration and operational excellence.

name: Pioneers Ventures
description: Pioneers Ventures is a EUR 10M early-stage VC fund empowering outstanding startups with its global network of corporates, industry experts, and entrepreneurs. Besides the financial component it provides startups with an extensive support program.
investmentAreas: B2B SaaS, Fintech, Green-Tech, Ed-Tech, Marketplace

name: APEX Ventures
description: APEX Ventures is a European venture capital firm focusing on deep tech companies. The team act not only as investors but also as company builders with a mission to support the most talented startup teams in building global market leaders.
investmentAreas: Deep-Tech, Med-Tech, Robotics, Artificial Intelligence, Mobility,

name: 3VC
description: 3VC is a European venture capital fund that invests in carefully selected startups with global ambition. We partner with companies with strong ties to DACH, CEE and the Baltics, focusing on Series A with an initial ticket size up to 10M. Together with our extensive network, our entrepreneurial team provides dedicated support to our portfolio companies.
investmentAreas: B2B SaaS, Med-Tech, Artificial Intelligence, Gaming, Agnostic

name: PUSH VC
description: As seasoned early-stage investors, Push VC understands how tough it can be to get innovative companies off the ground, and they know that setbacks often come from the smallest missteps. They are eager to team up, work together, and help these ventures reach new heights.Push VC is committed to combatting climate change and transforming healthcare. Their initial investments are typically at the pre-seed or seed stage with the potential to follow on. Focus areas are health and the future of the planet in Europe, especially Austria and Germany.
investmentAreas: Green-Tech, Clean-Tech, Med-Tech, Insur-Tech, Med-Tech, Food & Beverage, Fin-Tech, Deep-Tech, Ed-Tech

name: CNB Capital
description: CNB Capital is an evergreen, early-stage investor with a focus on high-tech B2B product companies showing first-customer traction. Its experienced team supports founding teams, especially in sales and marketing or corporate development. CNB is looking for technologies with a strong unique selling proposition and good scaling potential - also in niches. CNB has a long-term view to building companies enabled by an enduring setup.
investmentAreas: B2B, Industrial Automation, Information Technology, Manufacturing, Software, Venture Capital

name: xista science ventures
description: Xista Venutres invest in deep tech startups and academic spin-offs with strong innovation based on science, engineering, and technology. They invest as lead investors in pre-seed and seed stages and have the ability to follow on in later rounds. Thanks to Xista’s diverse team, their expertise and experience in technology, entrepreneurship, finance, legal, IP, and strategic consulting will support your startup right from the start.
investmentAreas: Deep-Tech, Med-Tech, Green-Tech, Bio-Tech

name: Speedinvest
description: Speedinvest is one of Europe’s most active early-stage investors with more than €1 billion AuM and 40+ investors based in Berlin, London, Munich, Paris, and Vienna. Their focused investment teams know your industry inside and out. Their proven experience, know-how, and deep networks are yours from day one. You also have full access to Speed Invest’s in-house Platform+ team of operational experts who can provide tailored growth marketing, people (HR), business development, and networking support throughout every stage of your journey.
investmentAreas: Deep-Tech, Fin-Tech, SaaS, Med-Tech, Green-Tech, Marketplace, Consumer,

name: aws Gründungsfonds
description: aws is a Venture Capital fund for Ideas and Innovations. aws Founders Fund invests venture capital during the start-up and early growth phase of Austrian start-ups. They support your future plans as a long-term investor and partner and believe in the additional value of co-investments.
investmentAreas: SaaS, Fin-Tech, Deep-Tech, Clean-Tech

name: Onsight Ventures
description: Onsight Ventures is at the forefront of early-stage investments in cutting-edge technologies, specializing in computing, semiconductors, synthetic biology (synbio), and biotechnology. As a visionary deep tech fund, Onsight takes a primary investment approach in the dynamic landscape of Europe, positioning itself as a catalyst for the growth and success of groundbreaking innovations in these transformative fields.
investmentAreas: Deep-Tech, Artificial Intelligence, AR/VR, Consumer

name: QC·VENTURES
description: QC·VENTURES is a Venture Capital investment platform of Q·ADVISERS that builds ad hoc investor syndicates around ideas and around a core team of experienced corporate finance professionals. QC invests in companies that have the potential for growth, disruption, and ambition to scale internationally.
investmentAreas: Fin-Tech, Social Impact, Envi-Tech, Med-Tech, Life Science

name: tecnet equity
description: Tecnet equity is an Austrian venture capital fund investing in new technology enterprises as well as companies with innovative business ideas through venture capital. As an early-stage investor, tecnet plays an active part in the Austrian start-up landscape for many years. The support tecnet provides goes far beyond a financial investment. Withpersonal commitment, an international business network and many years of experience, tecnet support you in making your business successful.
investmentAreas: Life Sciences, Industrial Technologies, Material Sciences, Environmental Technologies

name: Fund F
description: Fund F invests in gender-diverse founder teams who are solving the biggest challenges of the 21st century. They invest in companies that address a huge market, while they create an impact by improving the lives of millions of people, and are a sector-agnostic fund, that specializes in industries that directly contribute to the progress of humanity.
investmentAreas: Climate-Tech, Fem-Tech, Health-Tech, Fin-Tech, HR-Tech

name: Mpoweru
description: Mpoweru is more than a venture capital firm; They are architects of transformative change and catalysts for global innovation. Based in Vienna, they have positioned themselves as a purpose-driven force, dedicated to shaping the future of entrepreneurship across the DACH region and beyond. Their commitment extends beyond financial investments; actively engage with visionary startups, leveraging their expertise and network to drive meaningful impact. At Mpoweru, they believe in the power of strategic partnerships, ethical investing, and the potential of every innovative idea.
investmentAreas: Artificial intelligence, Cloud computing and infrastructure, Cybersecurity, E-commerce, digital marketplaces, Internet of Things

name: red-stars.com
description: Red-stars invests in and manages companies that provide essential products and services for digitalization. They focus on mission-critical offerings in the Life Sciences sector. Their expertise ensures these companies meet the highest industry standards.
investmentAreas: B2B, Fast Prototyping, Connectivity, Transactions, EDI, SRM, AI , IP Video Analysis, AI & AR, Blockchain, Big Data, Sharing, Compliance, IOT, Migration, and Cloud

name: Square One Foods
description: Square One Foods acts as a strategic partner and investor for innovative startups in the food and beverage industry. In close collaboration with Spitz – one of Austria’s largest and most technologically advanced food producers – They offer a package unrivalled by any other venture capitalist or business angel
investmentAreas: Food & Beverage, FMCG, Food-Tech, Consumer

name: FSP Ventures
description: FSP Ventures invests in Austria and neighboring regions with the aim to support innovative environmental technologies to jointly achieve sustainable growth together with management and to make a contribution towards solving environmental and social challenges.
investmentAreas: Clean-Tech, Green-Tech, Sustainablity, Circular Economy

name: Segnalita
description: Segnalita is very proud of working together with passionate entrepreneurs and promising companies. With a focus on the future and the ongoing expansion of their portfolio they are continuously looking for enthusiastic founders and their ideas.
investmentAreas: Clean-Tech, Green-Tech, Sustainablity, Circular Economy

name: WaVe-X
description: WaVe-X is a great partner to accelerate expansion and capitalize on market opportunities. This collaboration not only represents a substantial cash injection, but also a plethora of resources, sales channels, and know-how.
investmentAreas: Logistics, Mobility, Prop-Tech, Construction-Tech

name: Findus Venture
description: Findus invests in DeepTech companies with sustainable business models that are to be used for the benefit of mankind. They back teams that are building our society and economy in a sustainable way. The focus is on Clean Mobility, New Space and Clean Energy using data analytics, AI and quantum technologies.
investmentAreas: Clean Mobility, New Space, Clean Energy, Artificial Intelligence

name: Hermann Hauser Investment
description: Investment company founded by Hermann Hauser in Central Europe and invests primarily in early-stage (seed, Series A) start-ups from the DACH region. The focus is on scalable technologies with high innovation potential from the fields of AI, Digital Health, Synthetic Biology, Operating Systems, Electronics, and Quantum Computing, among others.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence, Digital Health, Synthetic Biology, Operating Systems, Electronics, Quantum Computing

name: Katharo Ventures
description: Katharo Ventures is a venture capital investment firm based in Vienna, Austria. The firm employs a seed-stage investment strategy investing in companies operating in the information technology sectors.
investmentAreas: Fin-Tech, Clean-Tech, Deep-Tech, Virtual Reality, Artificial Intelligence,

name: Camouflage Ventures
description: Camouflage Ventures is a venture and equity boutique, based in Vienna/Austria. They invest in outstanding business models driven by strong founders & teams. Based on their track record of around 20 investments, Camouflage Ventures provides know-how, network, and access to various industry ecosystems to our portfolio companies.
investmentAreas: Deep-Tech, Consumer, Gaming, Med-Tech

name: Situlus
description: Situlus, an independent Austrian investment firm, makes investments in small and medium-sized businesses. They invest in innovative technology companies as an early-stage financier for research and development.
investmentAreas: Circular Economy, Automation, Food & Beverage, Augmented Reality

name: RKP InnoInvest
description: RKP InnoInvest provides Investment capital and strategic services to support progressive and dynamic start-ups and companies. They combine not only cash investments but also the competencies of business and tax consulting, marketing agency, and IT solutions.
investmentAreas: Food and Beverage, FMCG, Health-Tech, Digital Technology

name: Hornet Ventures
description: Hornet Ventures invests in seed-stage companies that focus on recurring revenue, pets, consumer products, or growth potential. If a business aligns with one or more of these areas, Hornet Ventures is interested in partnering. They aim to work together to turn entrepreneurial visions into reality.
investmentAreas: Consumer, Pet-Tech, Med-Tech, Crypto, Fin-Tech

name: Motec ventures
description: motec ventures is the growth fund for leading medium-sized companies: a smart mobility venture platform at the interface between SMEs and start-ups. The focus is on scaling early-stage start-ups in close cooperation with players from the automotive industry. The joint venture was founded by the German automotive management consultancy e&Co. AGand the Austrian venture capital experts of Venionaire Capital. motec ventures is managed from Vienna, Berlin and Munich and supported by an international network with offices in the USA, China and South Korea. Scale your business and explore growth options together.
investmentAreas: Automotive, Deep-Tech, HR-Tech, Artificial Intelligence

name: Gasser + Partner
description: Since 1999, Gasser+Partner has been a competent and reputable partner for promising companies and start-ups in the Alps-Adriatic region, providing experience, know-how, and valuable capital to help them reach the summit together.
investmentAreas: Cosmetics, Renewable energy, Med-Tech, Clean-Tech

name: Smart Capital
description: Smart Capital seeks projects with outstanding entrepreneurs, a superior business plan that provides a clear path to revenue, and a distinct and sustainable competitive advantage. Smart Capital creates value for the projects by serving as board members and providing strategic direction and constructive inputs to the business. Smart Capital istherefore more than financiers. The common objective is to significantly enhance the value of every company for the benefit of all its shareholders through joint efforts
investmentAreas: SaaS, Prop-Tech, Bio-Tech, Clean-Tech

name: Loonshot
description: Loonshot Ventures invests in startups at various stages, from seed funding to Series A, B, and C. Our focus is on supporting startups in their growth and enabling their long-term success. Their vision is to be a major player in the field of innovation and to help shape the future of the world.
investmentAreas: AgroTech, FoodTech, FMCG, Digital Business Models

name: eQventure
description: eQventure is one of Austria’s leading venture capital firms with hubs in Austria, Germany, UK, Israel, USA and China. In addition to growth capital, eQventure provides young Austrian high-tech companies with a strong global network and operational support aimed at accelerating their growth. Behind eQventure are several successful entrepreneurs who invest their own money and expertise in addition to taking a hands-on role with their portfolio companies. The European Investment Fund leverages all eQventure high-tech investments with its European Angels Fund.
investmentAreas: Deep-Tech, Industrial Tech, Network Effects, Digital Health,Consumer-Tech

name: UNIQA Ventures
description: UNIQA Ventures is the Venture Capital arm of UNIQA Insurance Group AG as well as a pioneer in Corporate-backed Venture Capital in Central &Eastern Europe. Based in Vienna, Austria, the firm is investing in outstanding business models driven by strong teams and a clear vision to shape the future of key industries.
investmentAreas: Med-Tech, Mobility, Prop-Tech, Fin-Tech, Insur-Tech, Blockchain, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Internet Of Things.

name: asp. group
description: Together with ambitious entrepreneurs worldwide, aps loves to co-create high-performing organizations ready to overcome tomorrow’s challenges. They selectively extend their expertise to advise founders in developing their companies. Over the decades aps has seen a lot of "ups and downs". Aps helps entrepreneurs to learn from those lessons to enable them to be more successful Driven by an impact focus, invest in powerful ventures, and pave the way to sustainable success as a long-term entrepreneurial partner.
investmentAreas: Agnostic, Med-Tech, SaaS, Artificial Intellignece, Logistics, Food & Beverage.

name: Next Monday Ventures
description: Next Monday Ventures is a premier venture capital firm dedicated to powering innovation and fostering visionary founders. With a commitment to excellence, they provide strategic funding, expert guidance, and global networks to transform pioneering ideas into thriving businesses. With approximately 100 million euros in assets under management, Next Monday Ventures offers strategic guidance, invaluable industry insights, and a strong network to empower ambitious entrepreneurs and shape the future of innovation in Europe.
investmentAreas: B2B Enterprise, Cyberspace, Metaverse, Cybersecurity, Hyperautomation, Artificial Intelligence,
